info.title: Leap API - Customer
info.description:
Help Leap users manage their customer data.

# Customer Object

| Key | Description |
| --- | --- |
| id | Customer's id |
| first_name | First name |
| last_name | Last Name |
| email | Customer's email |
| additional_emails | Customer's added additional emails |
| referred_by_type | Referred by user |
| referred_by_note | Referred note |
| call_required | If call required or not |
| appointment_required | If appointment required or not |
| note | Customer note |
| is_commercial | Specify whether the customer is a commercial customer |
| company_name | company name of the commercial customers |
| created_at | The date and time when the customer was created. |
| management_company | Customer's Management Company |
| property_name | Property Name |
| canvasser | Canvasser Name |
| canvasser_type | Canvasser Type : user, other |
| canvasser_id | Canvasser's Id if type is user |
| call_center_rep | Call centre representative |
| call_center_rep_type | Call centre representative Type: user, other |
| call_center_rep_id | Call centre representative's Id if type is user |

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all customers of the company.

#### Request Params

| Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **includes\[\]** | Options available: `phones, address, billing, rep, jobs, contacts, canvasser, call_center_rep, referred_by` |

> Example 
  

#### includes\[\] Details

> phones 
  

The Phone number information will be returned by includes in the format below:

``` json
"phones": {
    "data": [
        {
            "label": "home",
            "number": "1111122222",
            "ext": null
        }
    ]
}

 ```

phones field will have the list of Phone numbers associated with the customer.

##### Phones field detail

- **label**: Phone number label for example. Home, office.
    
- **number**: Phone number.
    
- **ext**: Optional phone number extension for example. +1.
    

> address 
  

The customer address information will be returned by includes in the format below:

``` json
"address": {
      "id": 327,
      "address": "Teasley Lane",
      "address_line_1": "",
      "city": "",
      "state_id": 5,
      "state": {
          "id": 5,
          "name": "California",
          "code": "CA",
          "country_id": 1
      },
      "country_id": 1,
      "country": {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "United States",
          "code": "US",
          "phone_code": "+1"
      },
      "zip": "77375",
      "lat": 10.812973,
      "long": -16.978363
  }

 ```

Address will have all the information related job like address id, state country, postcode etc.

##### Address field detail

- **id**: Unique address id
    
- **address**: The street address
    
- **address_line_1**: An optional additional field for the street address
    
- **city**: The city, town, or village of the address
    
- **state**: State information of the address
    
- **country_id**: Id of the Country associated with the address
    
- **country**: Country information of the address with all the details.
    
- **lat**: The latitude of the address.
    
- **long**: The longitude of the address.
    

> billing 
  

The billing address of the customer and fields will be the same as customer address.

> rep 
  

The Representative information will be returned by includes in the format below:

``` json
"rep": {
    "id": 25,
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "company_id": 6,
    "company": "John Constructions",
    "admin_privilege": false,
    "group": {
        "id": 5,
        "name": "owner"
    },
    "added_date": "2019-11-15 05:53:09",
    "profile_pic": null,
    "active": true,
    "company_name": null,
    "color": "blue",
    "role": [
        {
            "name": "plus-admin"
        }
    ]  
}

 ```

rep field will have information of Representative associated with the customer.

##### Rep field detail

- **id**: Unique representative id
    
- **first_name**: First name of the representative.
    
- **last_name**: Last name of the representative.
    
- **email**: Email of the representative.
    
- **company_id**: Company id of the representative associated with.
    
- **company**: Company details of the representative.
    
- **admin_privilege**: shows if representative has admin privileges or not.
    
- **group**: User group information of the representative.
    
- **added_date**: The date and time when the representative was created in the system.
    
- **profile_pic**: Profile picture of the representative.
    
- **active**: Shows if representative is active or not.
    
- **company_name**: Company name of the representative if user is commercial.
    
- **color**: Color information associated with representative.
    
- **role**: Role information of the representative.
    

> jobs 
  

The Job information will be returned by includes in the format below:

``` json
"jobs": {
     "data": [
         {
             "id": 175,
             "name": "Test Job",
             "number": "1911-170-01",
             "customer_id": 170,
             "description": "Job test 023456789",
             "same_as_customer_address": 1,
             "other_trade_type_description": null,
             "created_by": 27,
             "created_at": "2019-11-29 13:33:00",
             "created_date": "2019-11-29 13:33:00",
             "updated_at": "2019-11-29 13:33:01",
             "deleted_at": null,
             "call_required": false,
             "appointment_required": false,
             "tax_rate": null,
             "alt_id": "1",
             "lead_number": "",
             "duration": "0:0:0",
             "completion_date": null,
             "contract_signed_date": null,
             "current_stage": {
                 "name": "Lead",
                 "color": "cl-red",
                 "code": "1866233278"
             },
             "contact_same_as_customer": 1,
             "insurance": 0,
             "archived": null,
             "multi_job": 0
         }
     ]
 }

 ```

jobs field will have the list of jobs associated with the customer.

##### Jobs field detail

- **id**: Unique job id
    
- **name**: Job name.
    
- **number**: Job number
    
- **customer_id**: Customer id associated with job.
    
- **description**: Job description.
    
- **same_as_customer_address**: If job address is same as customer address.
    
- **other_trade_type_description**: if `trades` is `other` then this field will have other trade note.
    
- **created_by**: User id who created the job.
    
- **created_at**: The date and time when the customer was created.
    
- **updated_at**: The date and time when the job last updated.
    
- **deleted_at**: The date and time when the job as deleted.
    
- **call_required**: If call required or not when added.
    
- **appointment_required**: If appointment required or not when added.
    
- **tax_rate**: Tax rate information.
    
- **alt_id**: Alternate job id.
    
- **lead_number**: Lead number.
    
- **duration**: Duration of the job.
    
- **completion_date**: Date time when job was completed.
    
- **contract_signed_date**: Date time when contract was signed.
    
- **current_stage**: Job stage information.
    
- **contact_same_as_customer**: If Contact user is same as customer.
    
- **insurance**: If job has insurance or not.
    
- **archived**: If job is archived or not.
    
- **multi_job**: if job is multiple jobs in single jobs.
    

> contacts 
  

The contacts information will be returned by includes in the format below:

``` json
 "contacts": {
     "data": [
         {
             "id": 85,
             "first_name": "John",
             "last_name": "doe"
         }
     ]
 }

 ```

contacts field will have the list of contacts associated with the customer.

##### Contacts field detail

- **id**: Unique contact id
    
- **first_name**: Contact first name.
    
- **last_name**: Contact last name.
    

#### Request Params (for filtering)

| Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **trades\[\]** | Array of trades ids |
| **stages\[\]** | Array of stage codes |
| **rep_ids** | Array of customer's **rep Ids** or **(string) unassigned** |
| **job_number** | Job number |
| **address** | Customers address |
| **job_address** | Job address |
| **phone** | customers phone number |
| **email** | customers email address |
| **name** | customers full name |
| **id** | Customer id |
| **states\[\]** | Array of State ids e.g, \[1,2\] |
| **has_jobs** | Boolean **1 (true) or 0 (false)** |
| **zip_code** | customer address zip code |
| **city** | city name |
| **cities\[\]** | name of cities |
| **referred_by_type** | referred by type \[**referred_by** : referred by id\] |
| **job_contact_person** | first name, last name(job contact) |
| **commercial** | (optional, boolean)(0/1) |
| **deleted_customers_duration** | (optional, boolean)(0/1) |
| **date_range_type** | Date range type filter (options: customer_created_date or customer_updated_date). This filter will only work when start date or end date filter will come. |
| **start_date** | Start date (optional: date, The date format must be Y-m-d) |
| **end_date** | End date (optional: date, The date format must be Y-m-d) |
| **job_alt_id** | Customer Job's Alt id (Job #) |
| **first_name** | Customer's First Name |
| **last_name** | Customer's Last Name |
| **country_id** | Country id of the customer's address |
| **customer_note** | Customer's Note |
| **job_rep_ids\[\]** | Array of job's rep ids |
| **flag_ids\[\]** | Customerâ€™s Flag Ids |
| **company_name** | Customer's company name |
| **property_name** | Customer's Property Name |
| **management_company** | Customer's Management Company |

> Example id=25&commercial=1&start_date=2019-12-03 
  

### Request Params (for sorting)

| Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **sort_by** | Options available: `id, created_at, first_name, last_name` |
| **sort_order** | Options available: `asc, desc` |

> Example

parameters.name: includes[]
parameters.description: Include related data in the response (select multiple values)

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Field to sort by

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Sort order (ascending or descending)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return (max 100)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search customers by full name or address

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search customers by email and full name

parameters.name: has_jobs
parameters.description: Filter customers by whether they have jobs (true) or not (false)

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude for distance-based filtering (requires long and distance)

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: Longitude for distance-based filtering (requires lat and distance)

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: Maximum distance in miles (requires lat and long)

parameters.name: trades[]
parameters.description: Array of trade IDs to filter customers by job trades

parameters.name: stages[]
parameters.description: Array of workflow stage codes to filter customers by job stages

parameters.name: job_number
parameters.description: Filter customers by specific job number

parameters.name: job_alt_id
parameters.description: Filter customers by job alternative ID (partial match)

parameters.name: job_address
parameters.description: Filter customers by job address (partial match)

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Filter customers by phone number

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter customers by email address

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter customers by full name (search)

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Filter customers by first name (partial match)

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Filter customers by last name (partial match)

parameters.name: or_last_name
parameters.description: Alternative last name search (used with first_name)

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Filter customers by city

parameters.name: cities[]
parameters.description: Array of cities to filter customers

parameters.name: country_id
parameters.description: Filter customers by country ID

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Filter customers by address (partial match)

parameters.name: rep_ids[]
parameters.description: Array of customer representative IDs or 'unassigned' for unassigned customers

parameters.name: call_center_rep_ids[]
parameters.description: Array of call center representative IDs, 'unassigned', or 'other'

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter by specific customer ID

parameters.name: customer_note
parameters.description: Search customers by notes

parameters.name: states[]
parameters.description: Array of state IDs to filter customers

parameters.name: job_rep_ids[]
parameters.description: Array of job representative IDs

parameters.name: not_required
parameters.description: Exclude specific customer ID from results

parameters.name: zip_code
parameters.description: Filter customers by ZIP code

parameters.name: flag_ids[]
parameters.description: Array of customer flag IDs

parameters.name: referred_by_type[]
parameters.description: Array of referral types

parameters.name: referred_by[]
parameters.description: Array of referral source IDs (used with referred_by_type=referral)

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: Filter customers by company name (partial match)

parameters.name: property_name
parameters.description: Filter customers by property name (partial match)

parameters.name: management_company
parameters.description: Filter customers by management company (partial match)

parameters.name: job_contact_person
parameters.description: Filter customers by job contact person

parameters.name: commercial
parameters.description: Filter commercial (true) or residential (false) customers

parameters.name: date_range_type
parameters.description: Type of date range filter to apply

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for date range filtering (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for date range filtering (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: deleted_customers_duration
parameters.description: Filter deleted customers by duration (0 or 1)

parameters.name: canvasser_type
parameters.description: Filter by canvasser type (user or other)

parameters.name: canvasser_id
parameters.description: Filter by specific canvasser user ID (when canvasser_type is user)

parameters.name: canvasser
parameters.description: Filter by canvasser name or description (partial match)

parameters.name: call_center_rep_type
parameters.description: Filter by call center representative type (user or other)

parameters.name: call_center_rep_id
parameters.description: Filter by specific call center representative user ID (when call_center_rep_type is user)

parameters.name: call_center_rep
parameters.description: Filter by call center representative name or description (partial match)

parameters.name: additional_emails[]
parameters.description: Array of additional email addresses to filter customers

parameters.name: rep_id
parameters.description: Filter by single customer representative ID (alternative to rep_ids[])

parameters.name: is_active
parameters.description: Filter by customer active status (true for active, false for inactive)

parameters.name: has_notes
parameters.description: Filter customers by whether they have notes (true) or not (false)

parameters.name: has_address
parameters.description: Filter customers by whether they have an address (true) or not (false)

parameters.name: has_phone
parameters.description: Filter customers by whether they have phone numbers (true) or not (false)

parameters.name: created_by
parameters.description: Filter customers by the user who created them

parameters.name: updated_by
parameters.description: Filter customers by the user who last updated them

last_name.description: (Conditionaly Required:  is_commercial is not available or false)  Last name of the customer

company_name.description: (Conditionally Required) if customer type is commercial

phones[0][label].description: (Required)  Array of phone label:- e.g:- [ [ label : string ] ]

phones[0][number].description: (Required)  Array of phone numbers:- e.g:- [ [ number: ext ] ]

referred_by_id.description: (if referred_by_type is referral or customer)  Referred user id

billing[same_as_customer_address].description: If billing address is same as customer address

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all customers of the company.

#### Request Params

| Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **includes\[\]** | Options available: `phones, address, billing, rep, jobs, contacts, canvasser, call_center_rep, referred_by` |

> Example `includes[]=phones&includes[]=address` 
  

#### includes\[\] Details

> phones 
  

The Phone number information will be returned by includes in the format below:

``` json
"phones": {
    "data": [
        {
            "label": "home",
            "number": "1111122222",
            "ext": null
        }
    ]
}

 ```

phones field will have the list of Phone numbers associated with the customer.

##### Phones field detail

\* **label**: Phone number label for example. Home, office.  
\* **number**: Phone number.  
\* **ext**: Optional phone number extension for example. +1.

> address 
  

The customer address information will be returned by includes in the format below:

``` json
"address": {
      "id": 327,
      "address": "Teasley Lane",
      "address_line_1": "",
      "city": "",
      "state_id": 5,
      "state": {
          "id": 5,
          "name": "California",
          "code": "CA",
          "country_id": 1
      },
      "country_id": 1,
      "country": {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "United States",
          "code": "US",
          "phone_code": "+1"
      },
      "zip": "77375",
      "lat": 10.812973,
      "long": -16.978363
  }

 ```

Address will have all the information related job like address id, state country, postcode etc.

##### Address field detail

\* **id**: Unique address id  
\* **address**: The street address  
\* **address_line_1**: An optional additional field for the street address  
\* **city**: The city, town, or village of the address  
\* **state**: State information of the address  
\* **country_id**: Id of the Country associated with the address  
\* **country**: Country information of the address with all the details.  
\* **lat**: The latitude of the address.  
\* **long**: The longitude of the address.

> billing 
  

The billing address of the customer and fields will be the same as customer address.

> rep 
  

The Representative information will be returned by includes in the format below:

``` json
"rep": {
    "id": 25,
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "company_id": 6,
    "company": "John Constructions",
    "admin_privilege": false,
    "group": {
        "id": 5,
        "name": "owner"
    },
    "added_date": "2019-11-15 05:53:09",
    "profile_pic": null,
    "active": true,
    "company_name": null,
    "color": "blue",
    "role": [
        {
            "name": "plus-admin"
        }
    ]  
}

 ```

rep field will have information of Representative associated with the customer.

##### Rep field detail

\* **id**: Unique representative id  
\* **first_name**: First name of the representative.  
\* **last_name**: Last name of the representative.  
\* **email**: Email of the representative.  
\* **company_id**: Company id of the representative associated with.  
\* **company**: Company details of the representative.  
\* **admin_privilege**: shows if representative has admin privileges or not.  
\* **group**: User group information of the representative.  
\* **added_date**: The date and time when the representative was created in the system.  
\* **profile_pic**: Profile picture of the representative.  
\* **active**: Shows if representative is active or not.  
\* **company_name**: Company name of the representative if user is commercial.  
\* **color**: Color information associated with representative.  
\* **role**: Role information of the representative.

> jobs 
  

The Job information will be returned by includes in the format below:

``` json
"jobs": {
     "data": [
         {
             "id": 175,
             "name": "Test Job",
             "number": "1911-170-01",
             "customer_id": 170,
             "description": "Job test 023456789",
             "same_as_customer_address": 1,
             "other_trade_type_description": null,
             "created_by": 27,
             "created_at": "2019-11-29 13:33:00",
             "created_date": "2019-11-29 13:33:00",
             "updated_at": "2019-11-29 13:33:01",
             "deleted_at": null,
             "call_required": false,
             "appointment_required": false,
             "tax_rate": null,
             "alt_id": "1",
             "lead_number": "",
             "duration": "0:0:0",
             "completion_date": null,
             "contract_signed_date": null,
             "current_stage": {
                 "name": "Lead",
                 "color": "cl-red",
                 "code": "1866233278"
             },
             "contact_same_as_customer": 1,
             "insurance": 0,
             "archived": null,
             "multi_job": 0
         }
     ]
 }

 ```

jobs field will have the list of jobs associated with the customer.

##### Jobs field detail

\* **id**: Unique job id  
\* **name**: Job name.  
\* **number**: Job number  
\* **customer_id**: Customer id associated with job.  
\* **description**: Job description.  
\* **same_as_customer_address**: If job address is same as customer address.  
\* **other_trade_type_description**: if `trades` is `other` then this field will have other trade note.  
\* **created_by**: User id who created the job.  
\* **created_at**: The date and time when the customer was created.  
\* **updated_at**: The date and time when the job last updated.  
\* **deleted_at**: The date and time when the job as deleted.  
\* **call_required**: If call required or not when added.  
\* **appointment_required**: If appointment required or not when added.  
\* **tax_rate**: Tax rate information.  
\* **alt_id**: Alternate job id.  
\* **lead_number**: Lead number.  
\* **duration**: Duration of the job.  
\* **completion_date**: Date time when job was completed.  
\* **contract_signed_date**: Date time when contract was signed.  
\* **current_stage**: Job stage information.  
\* **contact_same_as_customer**: If Contact user is same as customer.  
\* **insurance**: If job has insurance or not.  
\* **archived**: If job is archived or not.  
\* **multi_job**: if job is multiple jobs in single jobs.

> contacts 
  

The contacts information will be returned by includes in the format below:

``` json
 "contacts": {
     "data": [
         {
             "id": 85,
             "first_name": "John",
             "last_name": "doe"
         }
     ]
 }

 ```

contacts field will have the list of contacts associated with the customer.

##### Contacts field detail

\* **id**: Unique contact id  
\* **first_name**: Contact first name.  
\* **last_name**: Contact last name

parameters.name: includes[]
parameters.description: Include related data in the response (select multiple values)
